name: Slane’s Irish Whiskey Smash
preparation:
This refreshing blend of citrus, sweetness and triple-casked Irish whiskey was one of the winners of the Slane Cocktail Series. But you don’t need to have Kimberly Nobrega’s bartending skills to make this award-winning cocktail.

In a shaker, muddle the lemon.

Add the remaining ingredients and ice and shake.

Strain into a rocks glass over ice.

Garnish with a mint sprig and lemon and lime wedges.

Serve with a straw.
